Package com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Controller

Class BaseController<Type extends BaseEntity,Repository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Type,UUID>,Dto,Service extends BaseService<Type,Repository,Dto>>

java.lang.Object
com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Controller.BaseController<Type,Repository,Dto,Service>
Type Parameters:
Type - The type of the entity this controller handles. Must extend BaseEntity.
Repository - The JPA repository associated with the entity. Must extend JpaRepository.
Dto - The Data Transfer Object (DTO) type used for transferring data to and from the controller.
Service - The service type that provides CRUD operations for the entity.
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildingController, Cost_Building_GoodsController, GoodController, Population_RequirementController, PopulationController, RecipeController, Requirement_Building_PopulationController
public class BaseController<Type extends BaseEntity,Repository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Type,UUID>,Dto,Service extends BaseService<Type,Repository,Dto>> extends Object
Generic base controller class that handles basic CRUD operations for a specified entity type. Utilizes Spring Web's RESTful controller annotations to map HTTP requests to corresponding service layer methods.

  • Method Details

    • postEntity

      @PostMapping(produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public Type postEntity(@RequestBody Dto dto)
      Creates a new entity based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      dto - The DTO containing the data to create a new entity.
      Returns:
      The created entity.

    • getEntities

      @GetMapping(produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Type> getEntities(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of entities.
      Parameters:
      pageable - Pagination and sorting information.
      Returns:
      A page of entities.

    • getEntity

      @GetMapping(path="/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public Optional<Type> getEntity(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Retrieves a specific entity by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the entity to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the entity if found, or empty otherwise.

    • putEntity

      @PutMapping(path="/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public Type putEntity(@PathVariable UUID id, @RequestBody Dto dto)
      Updates an existing entity with the provided DTO data.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the entity to update.
      dto - The DTO containing the updated data.
      Returns:
      The updated entity.

    • patchEntity

      @PatchMapping(path="/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public Type patchEntity(@PathVariable UUID id, @RequestBody Dto dto)
      Partially updates an existing entity with the provided DTO data.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the entity to update.
      dto - The DTO containing the changes.
      Returns:
      The updated entity.

    • deleteEntity

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public Type deleteEntity(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Deletes an existing entity by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      id - The UUID of the entity to delete.
      Returns:
      The deleted entity.
